properties.areaDesc: Van Buren; Warren; Grundy; Wayne; Coffee; Lawrence; Marshall; Giles; Bedford
properties.headline: Flood Watch issued February 9 at 3:00AM CST until February 11 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...Flood Watch Monday through Midday Tuesday...

.A slow moving cold front will bring an extended period of rain
to the area...adding up to 2 inches or more. Flooding is very
possible given the amount of rain we have had over the past week.

The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a

* Flood Watch for a portion of Middle Tennessee, including the
following areas, Bedford, Coffee, Giles, Grundy, Lawrence,
Marshall, Van Buren, Warren, and Wayne.

* From Monday morning through Tuesday midday.

* For excessive rainfall, 2 inches or more.

* Localized flooding is possible, and fast-rising creeks and
streams may overflow their banks.
properties.instruction:
A Flood Watch means there is a potential for flooding based on
current forecasts.

You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible
Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be
prepared to take action should flooding develop.

NWSheadline: FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING
